io.spine.server.procman

Class ProcessManagerRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.RecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
        • io.spine.server.entity.DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
          • io.spine.server.entity.EventDispatchingRepository<I,P,S>
            • io.spine.server.procman.ProcessManagerRepository<I,P,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of IDs of process managers
    P - the type of process managers
    S - the type of process manager state messages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<I>>, MulticastDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,I>, CommandDispatcherDelegate<I>, EventDispatcher<I>, ExternalDispatcherFactory<I>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class ProcessManagerRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends EventDispatchingRepository<I,P,S>
implements CommandDispatcherDelegate<I>
    The abstract base for Process Managers repositories.
    See Also:
    ProcessManager

    • Method Detail

      • onRegistered

        public void onRegistered()
        The callback called by a BoundedContext during the registration of the repository.

        Caches Column definitions of the Entity class managed by this repository.

        Registers itself with the EventBus of the parent BoundedContext.

        Registers with the CommandBus for dispatching commands (via delegating dispatcher).

        Registers with the IntegrationBus for dispatching external events and rejections.

        Ensures there is at least one handler method declared by the class of the managed process manager:

        • command handler methods;
        • domestic or external event reactor methods;
        • domestic or external rejection reactor methods;
        • commanding method.

        Throws an IllegalStateException otherwise.

        Overrides:
        onRegistered in class EventDispatchingRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

      • messageClasses

        public java.util.Set<EventClass> messageClasses()
        Obtains a set of event classes on which process managers of this repository react.
        Returns:
        a set of event classes or empty set if process managers do not react on domestic events

      • externalEventClasses

        public java.util.Set<EventClass> externalEventClasses()
        Obtains classes of external events on which process managers managed by this repository react.
        Returns:
        a set of event classes or an empty set, if process managers do not react on external events

      • commandClasses

        public java.util.Set<CommandClass> commandClasses()
        Obtains a set of classes of commands handled by process managers of this repository.
        Returns:
        a set of command classes or empty set if process managers do not handle commands

      • commandRouting

        protected final CommandRouting<I> commandRouting()
        Obtains command routing schema used by this repository.

      • lifecycle

        public final LifecycleRules lifecycle()
        Obtains configurable lifecycle rules of this repository.

        The rules allow to automatically archive/delete entities upon certain event and rejection types produced.

        The rules can be set as follows: 

        
   repository.lifecycle()
             .archiveOn(Event1.class, Rejection1.class)
             .deleteOn(Rejection2.class)

      • outgoingEvents

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<EventClass> outgoingEvents()
        Description copied from class: Repository
        Obtains classes of the events produced by this Repository.

        For convenience, the default version returns empty collection. This method should be overridden by repositories which actually produce events.

        Overrides:
        outgoingEvents in class Repository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>>

      • dispatchCommand

        public I dispatchCommand(CommandEnvelope command)
        Dispatches the command to a corresponding process manager.

        If there is no stored process manager with such an ID, a new process manager is created and stored after it handles the passed command.

        Parameters:
        command - a request to dispatch

      • dispatchTo

        protected final void dispatchTo(I id,
                                io.spine.core.Event event)
        Dispatches the given event to an entity with the given ID.

        Sends a system command to dispatch the given event to a reactor.

      • lifecycleOf

        protected EntityLifecycle lifecycleOf(I id)
        Obtains an instance of EntityLifecycle for the entity with the given ID.

        It is necessary that a tenant ID is set when calling this method in a multitenant environment.

        Overridden to expose the method into current package.

        Overrides:
        lifecycleOf in class Repository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>>
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the target entity
        Returns:
        EntityLifecycle of the given entity

      • findOrCreate

        protected P findOrCreate(I id)
        Loads or creates a process manager by the passed ID.

        The process manager is created if there was no manager with such an ID stored before.

        The repository injects CommandBus from its BoundedContext into the instance of the process manager so that it can post commands if needed.

        Overrides:
        findOrCreate in class RecordBasedRepository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the process manager to load
        Returns:
        loaded or created process manager instance

      • createExternalDispatcher

      • eventFilter

        @Pure
 @SPI
protected EventFilter eventFilter()
        Creates an EventFilter for this repository.

        All the events posted by this repository, domain and system, are first passed through this filter.

        By default, the filter allows all the events to be posted. Override this method to change this behaviour.

        The ProcessManagerRepository changes the default behaviour and allows all the events except for EntityStateChanged. It is supposed that the changes of a process manager state are not worth being published.

        Override this method to change the behaviour.

        Overrides:
        eventFilter in class Repository<I,P extends ProcessManager<I,S,?>>
        Returns:
        an EventFilter to apply to all posted events
